feed.title: Ortege Blog: Insights, Trends, and Analysis in Blockchain Technology

entry.title: Ortege's New API and the Rise of the Semantic Layer
entry.content: At Ortege, we're building the future of blockchain data accessibility. Our mission is to empower everyone, from seasoned analysts to curious newcomers, with the tools and insights to navigate the complex world of crypto. Today, we're thrilled to announce a major leap forward: the upcoming launch of Ortege's new API, powered by Cube.js.Breaking Down Data Silos: The Need for a Semantic LayerThe blockchain data landscape is fragmented. Each chain, with its unique structure and terminology, presents a barrier to entry for those seeking comprehensive insights. Â This is where the concept of a semantic layer emerges as a critical solution.A semantic layer acts as a unified interface, abstracting the complexities of underlying data sources and providing a consistent, easy-to-understand view of the data. Imagine querying Bitcoin, Ethereum, Stacks, and Stellar data using the same language and structure - that's the power of a semantic layer.Cube.js: Â Our Semantic Layer PowerhouseWe chose Cube.js to build Ortege's semantic layer because of its:Flexibility: Cube.js seamlessly integrates with a wide range of databases, enabling us to connect to our diverse blockchain datasets.Data Modeling: Â Its powerful data modeling capabilities allow us to define a unified schema across all our supported blockchains, standardizing terminology and relationships.API Options: Cube.js provides flexible API options, including REST, GraphQL, and WebSockets, giving our users the freedom to choose the best fit for their applications.Unlocking Insights with Ortege's API:Our new API, currently available to select partners, will soon be open to a wider audience. Â Hereâ€™s what you can expect:Query any of our public datasets using SQL: Â Access data for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Stacks, Stellar, Movement, and cryptocurrency pricing, all through a consistent SQL interface.Build custom dashboards and applications: Â Integrate Ortegeâ€™s API into your own tools and workflows to gain real-time blockchain insights.Benefit from a standardized data schema: Â Explore blockchain data across different chains with ease, thanks to Cube.js's unified semantic layer.A Glimpse into the Future:We're continuously expanding Ortege's API capabilities, including:Real-time data updates via WebSockets: Â Stay up-to-date on the latest blockchain activity as it happens.Advanced analytics and machine learning: Integrate with our upcoming ML pipelines on Vertex AI for predictive modeling and deeper insights.New datasets: Â We're constantly adding new blockchain datasets, including DefiLlama and LunarCrush, to provide you with the most comprehensive coverage.Ortege's API, powered by Cube.js and our robust semantic layer, is revolutionizing how the world interacts with blockchain data. Â Join us on this journey to unlock transparency, empower informed decisions, and drive the future of decentralized finance.â€

entry.title: The Bitcoin Bungalow | Issue 16 | July 23 2024
entry.content: ğŸ“ˆ General Bitcoin Market NewsWe have decided to change our release schedule to fortnightly. This is the first issue with a 2 week gap. Enjoy!â€Fear and Greed Indexâ€Current Value:Â 71Change in Last 2 Weeks:Â +44â€Click Image for More Detailâ€â€Bitcoin Price Updateâ€Current Price: $67,432.97Fortnightly Percentage Change: +18.1%â€Click Image for Ortege Studioâ€Fortnightly Market SentimentBitcoin up 18.1%Â in past 2 weeks!US ETFs are netting a whopping inflow of +$8.4B whilst HK are netting an inflow of +$105.2MÂ bringing total net outflows across USÂ and HK to +$8.5B which seems to indicate a change in momentum and general sentiment towards positivity and greed: sourceâ€These past couple of weeks with the shock of the Trump assassination attempt and Biden stepping down may or may not have played a role in the change of sentiment, but with the ETHÂ ETF after being approved, there is an unstoppable optimism breaking through the surface.The federal funds rate (FFR) is steady at 5.25-5.5%.â€Fortnightly BTC LiquidationsTotal Shorts Liquidated:Â $341MTotal Longs Liquidated:Â $254.6MSourceğŸŒ Bitcoin Ecosystem UpdatesTop HeadlinesFranklin Templeton leads $11 million Series A into Bitlayer in bid to scale Bitcoin network. Learn moreBitAcross partners with Bitlayer to bring a cross-chain bridge, that connects assets within the EVM and Bitcoin ecosystems.Bitlayer researcher Xavier publishes a comprehensive write-up on the latest breakthroughs with the BitVM bridge. Learn moreâ€Pre-register to be the first to explore BitLayer Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-registerâ€â€Top HeadlinesBOB Completes $1.6M Strategic Raise from Ledger Cathay Fund and Angel Investors. Learn moreBOB Chain hits 7 million transactions.USDC is now supported on Orbiter for bridging to BOB.â€Pre-register to be the first to explore BOB Data through Ortege Studio: Pre Registerâ€Top HeadlinesDoubler will soon support BTCÂ on B2. Doubler is an asset yield rights separation protocol. Learn moreBedrock announce that uniBTC is now available on B2. Mint uniBTC on BÂ² and unlock new yield opportunities, here.KiloEx perpetuals DEX announces strategic partnership with B2.Pre-register to be the first to explore B2 Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesAvalon Finance announce strategic partnership with Botanix.Ankr announce partnership with Botanix.Spindle Finance announce strategic partnership with Botanix to bring bring better yield with safer vaults and automated smart contracts.â€Pre-register to be the first to explore Botanix Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesMerlin introduced a $210M grant program for builders. Apply hereInception announce strategic partnership with Merlin to bring their restaking protocol to the network.Bedrock's UniBTC is now mintable on Merlin.â€Pre-register to be the first to explore Merlin Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesNetwork update: Arrowhead 6.3.1 upgrade is coming on July 24th at block 6,549,300. Â This patch introduces key consensus changes to keep the network humming.Rootstock announce a new Runes Toy Bridge that allows devs to easily build Runes apps on chain. Learn moreLatest BitVMXÂ updatesâ€Pre-register to be the first to explore Rootstock Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesIntroducing the first trading bot XBOT on Stacks. Set up hereBitGo becomes institutional Stacks signer.Based Dollar announce a digital dollar backed by Bitcoin. sBTC coming soon:â€â€ Here's how easy it is to create a dashboard with Stacks data on Ortege Studio:Check out our Stacks Nakamoto DashboardSign UpUpcoming EventsBitcoin Builders:Location: Nashville, TennesseeVenue: Acme Feed & SeedDates:Â July 25-26â€Ticketsâ€Closing Thoughtsâ€The past fortnight has witnessed a remarkable turnaround in market sentiment, buoyed by significant positive movements in Bitcoin's price and ETF inflows. As geopolitical and economic factors continue to influence the crypto landscape, staying connected and informed is more vital than ever. â€Join our Telegram Community and don't miss out on any action. Sign up now to gain exclusive access to our Telegram bot for on-chain insights in the comfort of your favourite messaging app and propel your journey in the world of crypto.â€Donâ€™t miss out on the action! entry.title: The Bitcoin Bungalow | Issue 15 | July 9 2024
entry.content: ğŸ“ˆ General Bitcoin Market Newsâ€Fear and Greed Indexâ€Current Value:Â 27Change Since Last Week:Â -24â€Click Image for MoreÂ Detailâ€â€Bitcoin Price Updateâ€Current Price: $57,096.14Weekly Percentage Change: -7.5%â€Click to View on Ortege Studioâ€â€Market SentimentBitcoin falls -7.5% to stir up some more market-wide fear.US ETFs are netting a whopping outflow of -$4.4B whilst HK are netting a modest inflow of +$12.19MÂ bringing total net outflows across USÂ and HK to -$4.4B which seems to indicate a continuation in the rise in fear as the BTC price dips further: sourceâ€This week, more outflows continue to retain fear and caution in the market, though Hong Kong inflows suggest the sentiment might be different in the East.The federal funds rate (FFR) is steady at 5.25-5.5%.â€BTC LiquidationsTotal Shorts Liquidated:Â $278.4MTotal Longs Liquidated:Â $383.5MSourceğŸŒ Bitcoin Ecosystem UpdatesTop HeadlinesBeFi Labs go live on Bitlayer. BeFi is a â‚¿RC20, Runes and Ordinals trading terminal that will bring Bitlayer users frictionless, fast, and fun BTCfi trading. DeBox integrate with Bitlayer. With DeBox supporting Bitlayer, users can view Bitlayer on-chain assets directly in the DeBox app.Bitlayer welcomes Domin Network. Domin integrates real-world commerce data into a multi-chain ecosystem using NFTs, DePIN, and AI to optimize consumer data in dApps.â€Pre-register to be the first to explore BitLayer Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-registerâ€â€Top HeadlinesBOB joins Particle Network to simplify Web3 UX and solve user fragmentation.Hamilton tokenize first USÂ Treasury Bills on chain on BOB!OpenBit has intergated BOBÂ and provided support for WBTC, ETH, and USDT.BOB is now connected to the Hyperlane network, enabling fast token bridging, interchain apps, and Permissionless Interoperability.Ionic is coming to BOB. Ionic is the #1 money market for Yield Bearing Assets on the OP Superchain with over $250m TVL.â€Pre-register to be the first to explore BOB Data through Ortege Studio: Pre Registerâ€Top HeadlinesParticle Network add B2 to the Chain Abstraction Coalition.OrangeLayer announce collaboration with B2. OrangeLayer is a staking infrastructure that brings Bitcoin's cryptoeconomic security to the Ethereum ecosystem.Bedrock is partnering with B2. Bedrock is the first multi-asset liquid restaking protocol backed by credible investors, including OKX and Babylon founder.NovaSeeds partners with B2. NovaSeeds is a solution provider aiming to democratize access to cutting-edge launchpads.OpenBit set to collaborate with B2.Pre-register to be the first to explore B2 Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesRunes Terminal partners with Botanix to create a seamless and secure experience for Runes enjoyers on Bitcoinâ€™s second layer.Tomo partners with Botanix to bring their all-in-one social wallet to Bitcoin.â€Pre-register to be the first to explore Botanix Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesSOFA.org is building on Merlin. SOFA brings MERL holders diverse financial product options, from BTC to various asset classes.ğ— ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—» ğ——ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—½ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—¨ğ—½ğ—±ğ—®ğ˜ğ—²: ğŸ®ğŸ´ ğ—ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—², ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ°:MERLÂ Airdrop Phase III has been distributed.Documentation has been updated. Read hereğ—¢ğ—½ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—¶ğ˜‡ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»ğ˜€ & ğ—•ğ˜‚ğ—´ ğ—™ğ—¶ğ˜…ğ—²ğ˜€Cross-Chain Asset SearchVerified Babylon Staking & Unstaking FeaturesOptimized Processing of Delayed Withdrawal TransactionsFixed Gas Fees IssuesFixed NFT Withdrawal IssuesFixed "Invalid Opcode" Errors Reported by Developersâ€Pre-register to be the first to explore Merlin Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesWigwam partners with Rootstock to enable users to seamlessly interact with decentralized apps via their wallet.Elk Finance brings secure, cross-chain functionality to Rootstock with its cross chain DEX.The RSKj Arrowhead 6.3.0t is now available, packed with improvements to enhance your experience. Learn moreâ€Pre-register to be the first to explore Rootstock Data through Ortege Studio: Pre-RegisterTop HeadlinesHypernative Labs set to bring their security solution to Stacks.sBTC coming soon:â€â€ Here's how easy it is to create a dashboard with Stacks data on Ortege Studio:Check out our Stacks Nakamoto DashboardSign UpUpcoming EventsBitcoin Builders:Location: Nashville, TennesseeVenue: Acme Feed & SeedDates:Â July 25-26â€Ticketsâ€Closing Thoughtsâ€This week's market movements underscore a challenging climate as fear takes a firmer hold, highlighted by significant outflows and a downturn in Bitcoin's price. However, emerging partnerships and innovations across the blockchain space offer a glimpse into the resilience and continued evolution of the ecosystem. For those keen to stay connected and further engage with the crypto community, join our new Telegram group where live discussions, updates, and insights are shared. Engage directly with the Ortege community, receive updates, and access exclusive content that could enhance your navigation through these volatile times.â€Join our Telegram Community and don't miss out on any action.
